scripts.merge-reports: cross-env npx mochawesome-merge cypress/reports/*.json > cypress/reports/merged-report.json && npx mochawesome-report-generator cypress/reports/merged-report.json -o cypress/reports
scripts.test: cross-env npx cypress open && npm run merge-reports
scripts.test-headless: cross-env npm run clean-reports && npx cypress run || true && npm run merge-reports
